definitions.definition: a line around the body at the waist ; its measurement
the narrowest part of a garment , usually at the waist, but may be above or below depending on the dictates of fashion or the whim of the designer
The horizontal line just below the windows of a car or other vehicle.

main_definition: a line around the body at the waist ; its measurement
secondary_definitions: the narrowest part of a garment , usually at the waist, but may be above or below depending on the dictates of fashion or the whim of the designer
( slang ) person having a large waistline
( automotive ) The horizontal line just below the windows of a car or other vehicle.
